sentence.Network_en: Did you go to mechanic schooI to Iearn all this airpIane guff?
sentence.Network_cn: 你是在机械学校学到关于飞机的那些玩艺的 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Don't listen to their guff about wanting to see you again.
sentence.Network_cn: 别听他们的什么希望再见到你的鬼话.

sentence.Network_en: Wow, that vice president guy can sure dish out the guff!
sentence.Network_cn: 哇, 那位副总统肯定又滔滔不绝地讲一大堆废话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: gufa 古法, guff 瞎扯, gufeng 古风体
we gonna get any guff from the hotel staff ., 我们从那酒店的人那得到什么消息没有.

list.abs: we gonna get any guff from the hotel staff ., 我们从那酒店的人那得到什么消息没有.

we were told that it played to his strengths , highlighting his experience at steering the economy just as the financial storm broke . well , someone needs to debunk such guff .我们被告知，他的发挥优势，突出自己的经验在指导经济就像金融风暴爆发。那么，需要有人揭穿这种废话。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (in the sense 'puff, whiff of a bad smell'): imitative

entry.def: If you say that what someone has said or written is guff, you think that it is nonsense.

auth_sentence.content: It is slick, contrived and eminently forgettable guff.

auth_sentence.content: People talk a lot of guff about philosophy.

auth_sentence.content: The foosty guff of an ancient wood drifted over and past in great imprisoning waves.
